item.title: How to write an iPhone app with PhoneGap
item.description: PhoneGap lets you write smartphone apps with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. No need to learn Objective-C or get used to proprietary C/C++ libraries. Sounds good in theory, but how easy is it really? I found the official documentation a little bit confusing, so I wrote this streamlined howto while I’ve been testing PhoneGap myself. If you got about an hour of time, these are the steps to follow to compile & run your own iPhone app:
